body:
Ah, I see :)

That still doesn't seem to do the simplifying, and there seem to be some difference with the import sorting. But good start :)

I'll see if that is actually not enough for my purpose.
yep it's good. Feel free to close, or leave it open if you want to add simplification to exports too
I don't follow. Maybe provide an example of what you mean.

This function doesn't seem to do the simplification, that is enabled by `gofumpt -s` (as that's done at different package).

I will paste example tomorrow.
Right. The format API is for gofumpt's own features, not gofmt's. gofmt's simplification feature is not available as a Go API anywhere.

Thinking about it again, given that gofumpt enforces gofmt's simplify flag, it's weird that it's not applied via the Go API. Pure Go users like gopls are getting a different experience, so this should be fixed.

issue.title: Remove unsupported golangci-lint setting for gofumpt simplify

labels.name: size/XS
labels.description: Denotes a PR that changes 0-9 lines, ignoring generated files.

labels.name: cla: yes
labels.description: Set by the Google CLA bot to indicate the author of a PR has signed the Google CLA.

repository.name: common-files
repository.description: Contains build files shared by many Istio repos.

issue.body:
The setting to simplify code is not supported by `golangci-lint` according to
https://github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/blob/505ed3c0f7fc4941a76e52c00e462ad38ecb79ec/.golangci.example.yml#L261.

This was for `gofmt` previously.

Signed-off-by: Kailun Qin <kailun.qin@intel.com>

issue.title: format: provide the "simplify" feature
issue.body:
Given that `gofumpt` enforces `gofmt`'s simplify flag, it's weird that
it's not applied via the Go API. Pure Go users like gopls are getting a
different experience, so this should be fixed.

This patch adds the support of the `simplify` feature via the Go API.

Fixes https://github.com/mvdan/gofumpt/issues/115

Signed-off-by: Kailun Qin <kailun.qin@intel.com>

issue.title: Add simplify option for gofumpt similar to gofmt
issue.body:
### your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.

gofumpt has a simplify option like gofmt, but it can't be triggered with a param like `simplify: true`.

### Describe the solution you'd like.

The ability to enable simplification with `simplify: true` in the yaml config.

### Describe alternatives you've considered.

Using gofumpt directly with the `-s` option.

### Additional context

_No response_

issue.title: testdata: add test for removing empty declarations
issue.body:
Fixes #49.

Or, more correctly, it looks like #49 was already fixed. This PR just adds a test to confirm.
